text:
Question 169) There are, due to the growing demand for water savings, equipment and utensils, such as ecological sanitary basins, which use 6 liters of discharge water instead of the 15 liters used by non -ecological toilets, as data of the Brazilian Association of Technical Standards (ABNT).
What will be the daily water economy obtained by replacing a non -ecological sanitary basin, which spends about 60 liters a day on discharge, with an ecological health basin?
A) 24 liters
B) 36 liters
C) 40 liters
D) 42 liters
E) 50 liters
